content: this beautiful crochet cowl is very beginner friendly it works up super fast and it s very warm and cozy this cowl can be made with or without the pompom edging this pattern has a video tutorial on youtube available via the link below https //youtu be/g8dthleyxom si=grv7foiik9g2lm-w materials worsted weight yarn 6 0 mm crochet hook stitch markers > **buy more save more** > > **no codes needed** > > **get 10% discount when you purchase 2 > patterns at once** > > **get 15% discount when you purchase 3 > patterns at once** > > **get 20% discount when you purchase 4 > patterns at once** > > **get 25% discount when you purchase 5 > patterns at once** > > **get 40% discount when you purchase 10 > or more patterns at once** this pattern has been thoroughly tested this is a pdf pattern and not a finished product it is a copyright issue of toyslab creations you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern but you can t sell share or modify part or all of the pattern if you have any questions about the pattern contact me via email happy crocheting
